obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_30_0: * We were told to keep you imprisoned for eternity..^1. too bad!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_31_0: * ... Would have loved to see you guys punished!^1! Hahaha!!/%
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_83_0: \E6* Well this is a fine how-do-you-do^1, isn't it^1, Kris?/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_85_0: \E1* ... That sounds like it might take a while./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_105_0: \E3* We have to find her^1, Kris..^1. Before she gets hurt!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_107_0: \E6* Maybe there's something we can escape with in here...?/%
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_141_0: \E6* Well^1, Kris^1! Let's not give up hope just yet!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_143_0: \E1* But^1, um^1, if we don't make it for some reason.../
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_144_0: \E6* Then I just wanted to say^1, um.../
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_145_0: \E1* I..^1. I'm glad I was able to meet.../
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_147_0: * Hey^1, idiots^1! Can you shut up!?/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_207_0: * Seriously though^1. I'm outta my cell./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_208_0: * I sweet-talked the warden into giving me the keys./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_229_0: \E2* I^1, uh^1, "invited" him to visit the trash can./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_232_0: \E0* Anyway^1, now there's a puzzle in the way./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_254_0: \E2* Hey^1, how 'bout we just sit tight and wait for Lancer?/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_255_0: \E2* He lives in the castle^1, he's bound to come save us./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_257_0: * ... why don't Kris and I just help you solve the puzzle?/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_259_0: * Look^1, I don't NEED your help./
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_261_0: \E6* ... but^1, uh^1, if you said what to do^1, out loud,/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_301_0: \E7* Damn it^1! Wait^1! We just did the same thing as last time!/%
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_311_0: \E7* What the hell^1? We were so close^1! Let us through anyway!/%
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_336_0: * Kris^1, are you sure you know what you're doing...?/%
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_343_0: * Enough resets!!^1! I'm doing the puzzle myself!!!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_378_0: * Great!^1! Now come and free us!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_523_0: *  Susie^1! You came to save us...!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_524_0: \E8* I knew you had the heart of a hero^1, Susie..!/
obj_prisonevent_slash_Step_0_gml_526_0: * Yeah^1, yeah^1, don't push your luck./%
